question: Which of the following statements are correct about Gold Monetization scheme? 1. It was launched in 2018. 2.The minimum amount of gold to be deposit is 30 gms. 3.RBI has allowed central and state governments and entities owned by them to deposit gold under Gold Monetization Scheme.
explanation: Gold Monetization Scheme was launched in 2015. The basic aim of this scheme is to monetize all the gold which is lying idle with individuals or institutions like banks.
